damage_formula.clan_boss: 7.5% of target MAX HP per turn
damage_formula.weaker_version: 3.75% of target MAX HP per turn (some champions have weaker HP Burn)
damage_formula.description: HP Burn deals percentage damage of target's MAX HP at the START of target's turn (before target takes actions). NOT affected by target's DEF, Increase/Decrease DEF buffs, or Weaken. Fixed percentage damage.
damage_formula.notes: HP Burn is MAX HP damage, meaning higher boss HP = higher HP Burn damage. UNM Clan Boss (200M HP) takes 15M damage per turn from HP Burn.

proc_mechanics.landing_process: 2-step: (1) Skill base chance (varies), (2) ACC vs RES check ((ACC - RES + 200) / 400, capped 0-95%)
proc_mechanics.notes: HP Burn placement requires both high base chance AND sufficient ACC. See Debuff_Landing.json for landing mechanics.

unm_clan_boss_200m_hp.notes: UNM Clan Boss (200M HP) takes 15M damage per turn from HP Burn (7.5% × 200M). Over 50 turns, theoretical max is 750M damage (assumes 100% uptime, unrealistic).

geomancer_a3_hp_burn_47_percent_uptime.notes: Geomancer A3 with 350 ACC vs UNM 300 RES: 62.5% land rate × 3-turn duration / 4-turn cycle = 46.9% uptime. Over 50 turns, HP Burn active ~23.45 turns, dealing ~352M damage.

geomancer_a3_master_hexer_52_percent_upt.notes: With Master Hexer T6 (30% extend +1 turn), Geomancer HP Burn uptime increases from 46.9% → 51.6%. Damage increases from 352M → 387M (+35M, +10% damage).

100_percent_uptime_dual_source.source_2: Brogni A1 (75% base × 62.5% ACC/RES = 46.9% land, 2-turn duration, 0-turn CD)
100_percent_uptime_dual_source.combined_strategy: Geomancer A3 primary source (46.9% uptime), Brogni A1 fills gaps (used every turn when HP Burn not active)
100_percent_uptime_dual_source.notes: With dual sources (Geomancer A3 + Brogni A1), HP Burn uptime approaches 90-100%. Geomancer applies 3-turn HP Burn every 4 turns. Brogni A1 (0-turn CD) fills gaps every turn when HP Burn falls off. Near-perfect uptime achievable.

geomancer.notes: Geomancer is PREMIUM HP Burn champion. 100% base chance, 3-turn duration, 3-turn CD. With Master Hexer, achieves ~52% uptime solo.

brogni.notes: Brogni A1 is excellent HP Burn supplement. 75% base chance, 2-turn duration, 0-turn CD (can apply every turn). Best used as gap-filler when primary HP Burn source (Geomancer) fails or falls off.

drexthar_bloodtwin.skill: Passive (Burning Rage - places HP Burn when hit)
drexthar_bloodtwin.notes: Drexthar passive is GUARANTEED HP Burn when attacked (100% base chance). Against UNM Clan Boss (attacks every turn), Drexthar places HP Burn every turn. Near-perfect uptime if ACC sufficient.

strategy_1_master_hexer.effect: 30% chance to extend debuff duration by 1 turn
strategy_1_master_hexer.notes: Master Hexer is HIGH VALUE for HP Burn champions. +1 turn extension on 3-turn debuff = +10% uptime.

strategy_2_multiple_sources.notes: Dual HP Burn sources enable near-perfect uptime. Geomancer A3 (primary) + Brogni A1 (backup) = >90% uptime.

strategy_3_high_acc.acc_impact: 350 ACC vs 300 RES = 62.5% land rate. 390 ACC vs 300 RES = 72.5% land rate (+10% land rate = +10% uptime).
strategy_3_high_acc.notes: ACC directly affects uptime. Geomancer with 390 ACC (vs 350 ACC) gains +10% uptime (46.9% → 56.9% with no Master Hexer, 51.6% → 61.6% with Master Hexer).

strategy_4_decrease_def_pairing.synergy: HP Burn is MAX HP damage (ignores DEF), but team benefits from Decrease DEF 60% for other damage sources
strategy_4_decrease_def_pairing.pairing: Geomancer HP Burn + Stag Knight Decrease DEF 60% = team damage ~2.5× + 15M/turn HP Burn
strategy_4_decrease_def_pairing.notes: HP Burn is INDEPENDENT damage source. Does NOT scale with Decrease DEF, but pairs well for overall team damage.

clan_boss.damage_potential: 15M per turn (7.5% × 200M HP UNM CB), 750M over 50 turns at 100% uptime
clan_boss.notes: HP Burn is TOP TIER damage source for Clan Boss. Single champion (Geomancer) contributes 352-387M damage from HP Burn alone (not counting Warmaster or base skill damage).

affinity_independence.description: HP Burn damage is MAX HP percentage, NOT affected by affinity (no weak affinity damage reduction)
affinity_independence.notes: HP Burn is AFFINITY-SAFE damage. Weak affinity only affects LANDING (glancing hits reduce ACC/RES success), not damage dealt.

defensive_scaling.description: HP Burn damage ignores target DEF, Increase/Decrease DEF buffs, and Weaken. Fixed percentage damage.
defensive_scaling.notes: HP Burn is PURE MAX HP damage. No DEF scaling, no ATK scaling. Only MAX HP matters.

vs_poison.poison_advantage: Can stack 10 poisons (50% MAX HP per turn total)
vs_poison.comparison: 1 HP Burn (7.5%/turn) = 1.5 Poisons (7.5% / 5% = 1.5). But poisons can stack to 10 (50%/turn). HP Burn better for single-debuff, Poison better for team-stacking.
vs_poison.notes: HP Burn is STRONGER per debuff, but Poison STACKS. For Clan Boss (10 debuff limit), HP Burn + 9 other debuffs (Decrease DEF, Weaken, etc.) often better than 10 Poisons.

mistake_1_low_acc.mistake: Building HP Burn champion with low ACC (e.g., 200 ACC)
mistake_1_low_acc.impact: 200 ACC vs 300 RES = 25% land rate. Geomancer A3 uptime drops from 46.9% (350 ACC) to 18.75% (200 ACC). HP Burn damage drops from 352M to 140M.
mistake_1_low_acc.solution: Build HP Burn champions with 350-390 ACC for reliable landing.

mistake_2_ignoring_master_hexer.mistake: Not taking Master Hexer T6 on HP Burn champions
mistake_2_ignoring_master_hexer.impact: Geomancer HP Burn uptime drops from 51.6% (with Master Hexer) to 46.9% (without). HP Burn damage drops from 387M to 352M (-35M, -10% damage).
mistake_2_ignoring_master_hexer.solution: ALWAYS take Master Hexer T6 on HP Burn champions (Geomancer, Drexthar, etc.).

mistake_3_solo_source_reliance.mistake: Relying on single HP Burn source (e.g., Geomancer A3 only)
mistake_3_solo_source_reliance.impact: Solo source uptime limited to ~52% (with Master Hexer). HP Burn damage capped at 387M. Gaps in HP Burn coverage (48% of turns have no HP Burn).
mistake_3_solo_source_reliance.solution: Add secondary HP Burn source (Brogni A1, Drexthar passive) to fill gaps and achieve >90% uptime.

mistake_4_confusing_hp_burn_with_poison.mistake: Thinking HP Burn and Poison are equivalent (both MAX HP damage)
mistake_4_confusing_hp_burn_with_poison.impact: HP Burn is 7.5%/turn (stronger), Poison is 5%/turn (weaker but stacks). Building 10 HP Burn champions wastes debuff slots (HP Burn does NOT stack).
mistake_4_confusing_hp_burn_with_poison.solution: Understand HP Burn is SINGLE debuff (does NOT stack), Poison STACKS to 10. Use 1-2 HP Burn champions max, fill rest of debuff slots with Decrease DEF, Weaken, Poison if needed.

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing (Geomancer damage contribution), community calculators, uptime formula validation
metadata.notes: Comprehensive HP Burn mechanics for damage attribution modeling and team building. CRITICAL FINDING: Geomancer HP Burn contributes 352-387M damage over 50 turns (solo, with Master Hexer), dual source (Geomancer + Brogni) achieves >90% uptime and 675M+ damage.
